content: the crochet snowman gnome pattern is packed full of fun options to build a variety of snowmen gnomes packed full of personality start with choosing from two different body types one that is more straight and another more round then decide what kind of nose your snowman gnome wants will it be round or more carrot-like finally finish off your creation with either a top hat that can be embellished with crochet holly leaves and berries or choose to add a beanie with a pop pom note the top hat is available on the blog with all the other options the beanie comes included in the inexpensive pdf option when you consider all these fun options along with your favorite yarn color combinations the possibilities are endless each one is sure to bring smiles and cheer the crochet snowman gnome is great for gifts gnome lovers snowmen lovers play decor and holiday decoration pattern information + your pdf purchase includes written instructions and helpful photographs to aid in construction + the pattern is written in english using us crochet terminology + the pattern is formatted to have one featured image at the beginning of the pattern for reference important images for construction within the pattern and all other full-sized images at the end for easy optional printing skills needed + the skill level needed is intermediate but ambitious beginners are always encouraged to try + the techniques you will need to know include chain single_crochet slip_stitch increase invisible decrease half_double_crochet double_crochet working in the back bar of the chain working in the front and back loop only bobble stitch front post double_crochet back post double_crochet picot invisible finish and the adjustable magic ring materials needed + yarn in your choice of colors about 192-252 yds/176-230 m of worsted/aran + a size e/4 3 5 mm crochet hook + stitch markers + tapestry needle + poly-fil stuffing + pins + scissors + chopstick to help stuff + 2 buttons approx 1/2 inch /12 mm + sewing thread coordinating with buttons + sewing needle + poly-pellets optional + knee-high nylon stocking white or lighter tan optional + clover pom pom maker 1-⅝ inch 45 mm optional finished measurements + using hook size e/4 3 5 mm the crochet snowman gnomes measure approximately 5 inches 13 cm tall without the top hat and approximately 6 inches 15 cm tall with the top hat wearing the beanie the crochet snowman gnome measures approximately 6 inches 15 cm without the pom pom and 7 5 inches 19 cm with the pom pom thank you thank you for supporting my small business it means the world wishing you a blessed day as you spread kindness and creativity happy crocheting find more this pattern along with many other designs can be found here on ravelry and the blog at www
